description: the name of the precinct compressed, e.g. 'Man6a'   First letter cap, rest small, no spaces, city only three letters, then number, then letter
the name of the turf without the precinct, e.g. 'Turf1'
the name of the voter in question associated with voterid, First name and Last name in proper format (first letter capitalized)
the age of the voter in question
the address of the door including apartment number or other detail, but no city and state
the full address but without apartment number or other things that the maps don't accept and NO zip code
numeric longitude value in decimal degrees
numeric latitude value in decimal degrees
decimal number with precise position of the line in the list, unique position for each person mentioned at a single address
